item.title: New Undergraduate Research Project (URP) and Undergraduate Independent Study (UIS) Registration Process
item.description: Beginning Fall 2025, undergraduate students will no longer submit physical forms to register for URP and/or UIS courses. Instead, students will register online via the Student Information System (SIS)! For more information on this exciting change, please visit the Office of the Registrar website! https://registrar.rpi.edu/services/course-registration/undergraduate-research-and-independent-study

item.title: Department of Defense college student programs information session | April 30
item.description: Date: Wednesday, April 30, 2025 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM - Learn about SMART Scholars and the National Defense Science Engineering Graduate Fellowship which provide funding for undergraduate and graduate students for up to five years. Citizens of the U.S., UK, Canada, Australia, and New Zealand are eligible. For information, email madige@rpi.edu or register at https://surveys.rpi.edu/jfe/form/SV_85M3eKII9idFy5M

item.title: RPI Libraries is here to support you during study days and finals
item.description: Study late at the Folsom Library on reading and study days. We’re open during finals week until 1 am most days. Argo Tea will also have extended hours. Schedule your study breaks! Folsom Library will have crafts, activities, games, and plushie study buddies available. Show off your RPI knowledge in our staff-created Jeopardy game and exchange your answer card for some study candy at the Service Desk. Bring your family in after commencement! We are open on Saturday, 5/10, from 2 pm to 6 pm.
item.author: Students

item.title: Arch Summer Kick-Off Event | May 19 at 12 PM
item.description: Starting at 12PM, you are invited to kick off the Arch Summer featuring a fun BBQ, good company, inflatable obstacle course, and great music by DJ Kev! It’s a perfect opportunity to relax, connect with the community, and celebrate the start of the season together. Be sure to visit the Resource tent, where you can find student support offices and grab some free swag!

item.title: Temporary Closure of Portions of Sage Avenue
item.description: We would like to inform you that essential repairs to a low-pressure condensate line serving our steam and heating systems will require the temporary closure of portions of Sage Avenue. The affected area is located near the Sage Avenue entrance to the academic campus, between the Ricketts Building and the 87’ Gymnasium. This work is scheduled to occur from approximately mid-July through mid-August, with completion planned before the start of the fall semester.

item.title: HelioCampus Syllabus Available for Summer Term April 28
item.description:
The HelioCampus syllabus module is available for faculty to access for the summer term beginning on April 28, 2025. Per requirements from the Provost’s office, faculty should have their syllabi published by June 2, 2025, two weeks after the start of classes.
